title: Paprika
writer: Yasutaka Tsutsui (novel), Seishi Minakami (screenplay), Satoshi Kon (screenplay)
actors: Megumi Hayashibara, Tôru Furuya, Kôichi Yamadera, Katsunosuke Hori
plot: When a machine that allows therapists to enter their patients' dreams is stolen, all Hell breaks loose. Only a young female therapist, Paprika, can stop it.
